thread.title: Google Assistant now rolling out to OnePlus 3 as OTA update
thread.title_full: Google Assistant now rolling out to OnePlus 3 as OTA update

title: Google Assistant now rolling out to OnePlus 3 as OTA update
text:
Google Assistant now rolling out to OnePlus 3 as OTA update Google Assistant now rolling out to OnePlus 3 as OTA update By March 8, 2017 “Google Assistant is packed with the latest Google Play Services update” 
Google recently announced that it will be bringing its Assistant to all smartphones running Android Marshmallow and above. Since the Assistant is bundled as an add-on in the katest Google Play Services update, users won’t have to wait for their smartphone manufacturer to push the update. However, OnePlus 3 ( review ) users might be among the first to receive the update. Several users have reported receiving the Google Assistant update, which is rolling out across the globe. If you haven’t received it yet, make sure you have the latest version of Google Play services installed, and of course, be patient. Facebook Comments
